nodes.bodyText:
Is this issues or PRs? (Or both?)
I'm not sure if we should be closing issues, but I agree we should be closing PRs
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 30
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed

nodes.bodyText: Both, I agree w/ you on issues, but expect it will force us to comment.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 30
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed

nodes.bodyText: I think I have a few changes to this.  Hold off for a bit.
nodes.diffHunk:

@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@

+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7
+# Issues with these labels will never be considered stale
+exemptLabels:

nodes.bodyText: We shouldn't have them as PR's, if they are being used by docs, they should be on official branches we review.  If a DNM isn't touched for 30 days, someone should ping.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+# Number of days of inactivity before an issue becomes stale
+daysUntilStale: 30
+# Number of days of inactivity before a stale issue is closed
+daysUntilClose: 7
+# Issues with these labels will never be considered stale
+exemptLabels:
